title: Love the Least
description: Love the Least is comprised of six chapters, an introduction and conclusion, plus three appendices. Chapter topics A Biblical View of Unborn Life, A Biblical View of Child Sacrifice, The Secular Case Against Abortion, The Risk of Doing Nothing, Loving Christ Through Loving Abortion-Vulnerable Children, and Why We Ignore Abortion. Additional content The Unique and Prophetic Place of Abort73.com, Why it is Wrong to Kill an Abortionist, and Who Are The Least of These?
author: Michael Spielman
